Question: LetinAR CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LetinAR

Product: FrontiAR™ Pro AR Optical System

- Overcomes brightness uniformity issue in existing AR optical systems
- Enhances performance by approximately three times
- Improves image quality for comfortable extended wear
- Showcased at CES 2024 with immersive AR demonstration
- Featured in successful productization cases with global customers Jorjin and Nimo
Summary_cn:
LetinAR

产品：FrontiAR™ Pro增强现实光学系统

- 解决了现有增强现实光学系统中的亮度均匀性问题
- 提高性能约三倍
- 改善图像质量，适合长时间佩戴
- 在2024年CES展会上展示，具有沉浸式增强现实演示
- Jorjin和Nimo是全球客户成功产品化案例中的特色合作伙伴
